Arena Trap

Prevents opposing Pokémon from fleeing.

Level-Up

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
# Pokémon Type Level
010 Diglett 1
011 Dugtrio 1
275 Trapinch 1

Natural Ability

The following Pokémon can have this ability when you find them in the wild.

010 Diglett
011 Dugtrio
275 Trapinch
